attributes.action: To give a trans-Empire referundum on the exceptabilty of relationship change with Scotland
attributes.additional_details: As Scotland is a large part of the current British Empire, and has many current and shared historical links with most other territories, countries, dependences and bases that currently comprise the empire - we ask that all parts of the British Empire be given a referendum to express their opinion democraticly on changes to Scotland statuses that will affect them, and not just Scotland deciding for them in isolation.
